title: 799: TOM LEE MAKES MASSIVE 2022 BITCOIN PREDICTION - HERE’S HIS TARGET!! 7 CRYPTO PREDICTIONS FOR 2022!!
description:
Tom Lee states that Bitcoin could explode up to four times from current levels by the end of next year.

“Now, in terms of percentage upside, again I’m kind of disappointed it didn’t reach $100,000 this year, but I think next year [it will] easily get to the $100,000, but…

Let’s say that it should have been $100,000 this year, so maybe Bitcoin is in that $200,000 range [next year].”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
